changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE event_handler ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, event_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES event_log(id), bean_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, method_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_attempt TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE, next_attempt TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE, attempts INT8 NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, delay_seconds BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, reason TEXT );
